answers.answer: My prayers are with you and your son. To have a perfect delivery and for him to be born in perfect health. Please keep us updated
I am sorry to hear your struggles. May God be with you and your son in these times. Keep your faith in God and hope all goes well. God bless!
I hope everything goes well for you and baby,, think positively :)
Good luck hun hoping everything goes well for u keep us updated.

I'm so sorry for the position you are in. There are great statistics in your favor. Many babies born at 26 weeks go on to be healthy happy babies. Just try and rest up. You and your son will be in my b prayers.
God be with you my dear.. my big sister was in the same condition but God helped her and her baby.. You are not the first. Jux relax and calm yourself down.. God be with you also
I hope everything turns out the best for the both of you. Good luck and stay positive not only for yourself bit for that little angel that is coming into the world! Xoxo
Good luck with the delivery of your son , hope all is well!
Prayers and hugs to you and your son. <3There is a baby in my daycare center that was born at 25 weeks and he will be turning 1 in a few weeks...

Good luck mama do they have you on bed rest in the hospital cause that might help to your little one in a little longer either prayers for you and your little I hope he pulls through quick and is blessed with a long healthy life
Hi was just wandering how u r doing and whether u have given birth yet or not?  I keep checking this post for an update but haven't heard anything since I hope u and baby r ok....

question: I will be 26 weeks on Wednesday and the doctors are not expecting me to make it to friday. They are anticipating that they will have to deliver my son here in the next day or two. My health (preeclampsia) is getting worse and the only cure is to deliver. Prayers are greatly needed for my son and I.***@****
title: Prayers needed
